subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Damion James scored with eight seconds left to help No. 8 Texas beat No. 2 U.C.L.A., 63-61, yesterday after the Longhorns blew a 16-point lead.
snippet: Damion James scored with eight seconds left to help No. 8 Texas beat No. 2 U.C.L.A., 63-61, yesterday after the Longhorns blew a 16-point lead.
